snippet: The opera, which opens Monday in Chicago, begins with a resonant scene in the wake of the Paris attacks: a performance interrupted by gun-toting terrorists.
abstract: Lyric Opera of Chicago is working to reassure audiences and defend its choice to stage Jimmy Lopez opera Bel Canto, which opens with terrorist attack; opera has taken extra steps to make audience aware of production's material and has pointed out it has been in planning stages for five years, long before terrorist attacks in Paris music venue.
lead_paragraph: The opera, which opens Monday in Chicago, begins with a resonant scene in the wake of the Paris attacks: a performance interrupted by gun-toting terrorists.

headline.main: Lyric Opera Seeks to Reassure Patrons Over a Work that Mirrors the Terror Out There
headline.print_headline: Lyric Opera Softens the Blow of a Work That Mirrors the Terror Out There
